alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Coastal Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 30 at 6:09AM EDT until October 30 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TODAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected along shorelines and tidal waterways (9.4 to 9.6 feet Mean Lower Low Water at Fort Pulaski). * WHERE...Beaufort, Coastal Jasper, and coastal southeast Georgia. * WHEN...Until noon EDT today. * IMPACTS...Saltwater inundation will impact some roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High tide will occur around 9:45 AM this morning at Fort Pulaski. Saltwater inundation will be possible 1 to 2 hours before and after high tide. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Fort Pulaski GA MLLW Categories - Minor 9.5 ft, Moderate 10.0 ft, Major 10.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.0 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.0 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/10 AM 9.5 2.0 0.6 N/A Minor 30/10 PM 8.2 0.7 0.7 N/A None 31/10 AM 9.2 1.7 0.7 N/A None 31/11 PM 8.0 0.5 0.8 N/A None 01/11 AM 9.2 1.7 1.0 N/A None 02/12 AM 7.9 0.4 1.1 N/A None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Visit water.weather.gov for additional water level and flood impact information.
